methods.apply:
Apply this function to the input chunk, returning an output chunk.

 The result is owned by this Context.

:param input: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.Chunk<ToLongCast.T>) - the chunk to transform
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.LongChunk<ToLongCast.T>) the result LongChunk
methods.makeToLongCast:
Create an LongFunctor that casts the values in an input chunk to an long.  An optional offset is applied to each
 value after the cast.

Note: Java generics information - <T extends io.deephaven.engine.chunk.Attributes.Any>

:param type: (io.deephaven.engine.chunk.ChunkType) - the type of chunk, must be an integral primitive type
:param size: (int) - the size of the largest chunk that can be cast by this functor
:param offset: (long) - an offset to add to each casted result
:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.hashing.ToLongFunctor<T>) a ToLongFunctor that can be applied to chunks of type in order to produce an LongChunk of values
